The report states that the largest dimension of the tumor is 2.2 cm. According to the rules provided, a T1 stage tumor has a size up to 2.0 cm. However, the report indicates that the tumor is measured at 2.2 cm, which falls in the T2 category. But, the report also mentions that the tumor is an invasive lobular carcinoma, grade 1 and the size of the tumor is measured as 0.4 cm in the largest diameter in the central part. It is possible that the 2.2 cm measurement includes the surrounding tissue or margins, and the actual tumor size is 0.4 cm. Therefore, based on the information provided, I would predict the T stage to be T1 (tumor size up to 2.0 cm).
